title: Let's not say goodbye
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, production company

description: The destruction of Australia's bushland and forests threatens already endangered species. Members of the Theatre in Education and the Real Fantasy Theatre Company take a humorous look at this serious problem.
